name: Nibbly
overview: Nibbly is an adaptation of a game seen on other platforms, such as Nibbly '92 on the C64. It has a Snake gameplay to it, as you eat pellets in the maze your snake gets longer, and the puzzle is how to hit all of the pellets on the board without touching your own tail. Luckily your snake doesn't continuously move, so you have a chance to plan ahead for the best path.
